title: Cryptography Basics
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
- **Symmetric**: Same key locks/unlocks (AES). Fast. Key exchange is hard.
- **Asymmetric**: Public encrypts, Private decrypts (RSA). Slow. Secure key exchange.
- **Hash**: One way fingerprint (SHA-256).

real_world_use_cases.description: Uses Asymmetric to exchange Symmetric key, then Symmetric for data.
